item.title: How can you build a dashboard to you field trials data
item.description: You are a plant breeder, you in the end of collecting all the data for a long and exhaustive four year project with the goal to find the crop lines with the best traits for the customers. Letâ€™s take a data set from the agridat package: The data is a field trial on 58 varieties of soybean, grown in four locations across two years in Australia. Now we look on the six first rows of the data:
